steps.title: The ğŸŸ¦ emoji symbolizes resistance to antisemitism and Jewish hate.
steps.content: The ğŸŸ¦ emoji symbolizes resistance to antisemitism and Jewish hate. The blue square represents the Stand Up to Jewish Hate campaign , an initiative to raise awareness about antisemitism in the US founded by Businessman Robert Kraft and the Foundation to Combat Antisemitism (FCAS). When the campaign launched in 2023, blue squares were featured on TV screens, billboards, and digital spaces. The squares took up 2.4% of the screen to highlight that Jews make up only 2.4% of the US population, but are the target of 55% of religious hate crimes. [6] X Research source Supporters of the campaign began using the ğŸŸ¦ emoji on social media to spread awareness further. Most included the emoji in their post captions, while some edited a blue square into images and videos they shared. The campaign has several associated hashtags, including #ğŸŸ¦, #StandUpToJewishHate, #StandUpToJewishHateğŸŸ¦, and #StandUpToAllHate.
